front.title: An Expedited Forwarding with Dropping PHB

abstract.t: This document defines a new per-hop behavior (PHB) forDifferentiated Services, the so-called 'Expedited Forwarding withDropping' PHB. Packets marked for this PHB are forwarded with thesame low-delay, low-jitter characteristics as packets marked withthe Expedited Forwarding PHB, but may experience a certainprobability of packet loss. This PHB is especially suited to providelow-delay services in cellular wireless networks
